item.title: Getting Started with Zig Programming Language
item.description: I’ve written some practice projects when I learned C before, but I haven’t tested them. there are more unit testing frameworks in C, so I don’t know which one to choose, so I might as well just use Zig to do the testing. I just saw this article Testing and building C projects with Zig, and I feel it is a good choice. I’ve heard about Zig for half a year, and I’m interested in the libc-independent, better C interop, and robust features.
